082/**
083 * Base class providing common services for renderers.  Most methods that update
084 * attributes of the renderer will fire a {@link RendererChangeEvent}, which
085 * normally means the plot that owns the renderer will receive notification that
086 * the renderer has been changed (the plot will, in turn, notify the chart).
087 * 
088 * <b>Subclassing</b>
089 * If you create your own renderer that is a subclass of this, you should take
090 * care to ensure that the renderer implements cloning correctly, to ensure
091 * that {@link JFreeChart} instances that use your renderer are also
092 * cloneable.  It is recommended that you also implement the 
093 * {@link PublicCloneable} interface to provide simple access to the clone 
094 * method.
095 */
096public abstract class AbstractRenderer implements ChartElement, Cloneable, Serializable {
097
098    private transient AbstractRendererProduct4 abstractRendererProduct4 = new AbstractRendererProduct4();
099
100        private AbstractRendererProduct3 abstractRendererProduct3 = new AbstractRendererProduct3();
101
102        private AbstractRendererProduct2 abstractRendererProduct2 = new AbstractRendererProduct2();
103
104        private AbstractRendererProduct abstractRendererProduct = new AbstractRendererProduct();
105
106        /** For serialization. */
107    private static final long serialVersionUID = -828267569428206075L;
108
109    /** Zero represented as a {@code double}. */
110    public static final Double ZERO = 0.0;
111
112    /** The default paint. */
113    public static final Paint DEFAULT_PAINT = Color.BLUE;
114
115    /** The default outline paint. */
116    public static final Paint DEFAULT_OUTLINE_PAINT = Color.GRAY;
117
118    /** The default stroke. */
119    public static final Stroke DEFAULT_STROKE = new BasicStroke(1.0f);
120
121    /** The default outline stroke. */
122    public static final Stroke DEFAULT_OUTLINE_STROKE = new BasicStroke(1.0f);
123
124    /** The default shape. */
125    public static final Shape DEFAULT_SHAPE
126            = new Rectangle2D.Double(-3.0, -3.0, 6.0, 6.0);
127
128    /** The default value label font. */
129    public static final Font DEFAULT_VALUE_LABEL_FONT
130            = new Font("SansSerif", Font.PLAIN, 10);
131
132    /** The default value label paint. */
133    public static final Paint DEFAULT_VALUE_LABEL_PAINT = Color.BLACK;

136    private transient Map<Integer, Paint> seriesPaintMap;

140     * in the {@link #lookupSeriesPaint(int)} method.
141     */
142    private boolean autoPopulateSeriesPaint;

145    private transient Paint defaultPaint;

148    private transient Map<Integer, Paint> seriesFillPaintMap;

151     * A flag that controls whether or not the fillPaintList is auto-populated
152     * in the {@link #lookupSeriesFillPaint(int)} method.

154    private boolean autoPopulateSeriesFillPaint;

172    private transient Map<Integer, Stroke> seriesStrokeMap;

175     * A flag that controls whether or not the strokeList is auto-populated
176     * in the {@link #lookupSeriesStroke(int)} method.
177     */
178    private boolean autoPopulateSeriesStroke;

181    private transient Stroke defaultStroke;
182
183    /** The outline stroke list. */
184    private transient Map<Integer, Stroke> seriesOutlineStrokeMap;
185
186    /** The base outline stroke. */
187    private transient Stroke defaultOutlineStroke;

190     * A flag that controls whether or not the outlineStrokeList is

196    private Map<Integer, Shape> seriesShapeMap;

200     * in the {@link #lookupSeriesShape(int)} method.

202    private boolean autoPopulateSeriesShape;

205    private transient Shape defaultShape;

208    private Map<Integer, Boolean> seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap;
209

211    private boolean defaultItemLabelsVisible;

214    private Map<Integer, Font> itemLabelFontMap;

223    private transient Paint defaultItemLabelPaint;

235     * Flags that control whether or not entities are generated for each

237     */
238    private Map<Integer, Boolean> seriesCreateEntitiesMap;
239
240    /**
241     * The default flag that controls whether or not entities are generated.
242     * This flag is used when both the above flags return null.
243     */
244    private boolean defaultCreateEntities;
245

247    private Map<Integer, Shape> seriesLegendShapes;
248
249    /**
250     * The base shape for legend items.  If this is {@code null}, the
251     * series shape will be used.
252     */
253    private transient Shape defaultLegendShape;
254
255    /**
256     * A special flag that, if true, will cause the getLegendItem() method
257     * to configure the legend shape as if it were a line.
258     */
259    private boolean treatLegendShapeAsLine;

262    private Map<Integer, Font> legendTextFontMap;

275     * text paint to use.

277    private transient Paint defaultLegendTextPaint;

280     * A flag that controls whether or not the renderer will include the
281     * non-visible series when calculating the data bounds.
282     */
283    private boolean dataBoundsIncludesVisibleSeriesOnly = true;

286    private int defaultEntityRadius;
287
288    /** An event for re-use. */
289    private transient RendererChangeEvent event;

291    /**
292     * Default constructor.
293     */
294    public AbstractRenderer() {
295        abstractRendererProduct3.setSeriesVisibleMap(new HashMap<>());
296        abstractRendererProduct3.setDefaultSeriesVisible2(true);
297
298        abstractRendererProduct2.setSeriesVisibleInLegendMap(new HashMap<>());
299        abstractRendererProduct2.setDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend2(true);
300
301        this.seriesPaintMap = new HashMap<>();
302        this.defaultPaint = DEFAULT_PAINT;
303        this.autoPopulateSeriesPaint = true;
304
305        this.seriesFillPaintMap = new HashMap<>();
306        this.defaultFillPaint = Color.WHITE;
307        this.autoPopulateSeriesFillPaint = false;
308
309        this.seriesOutlinePaintMap = new HashMap<>();
310        this.defaultOutlinePaint = DEFAULT_OUTLINE_PAINT;
311        this.autoPopulateSeriesOutlinePaint = false;
312
313        this.seriesStrokeMap = new HashMap<>();
314        this.defaultStroke = DEFAULT_STROKE;
315        this.autoPopulateSeriesStroke = true;
316
317        this.seriesOutlineStrokeMap = new HashMap<>();
318        this.defaultOutlineStroke = DEFAULT_OUTLINE_STROKE;
319        this.autoPopulateSeriesOutlineStroke = false;
320
321        this.seriesShapeMap = new HashMap<>();
322        this.defaultShape = DEFAULT_SHAPE;
323        this.autoPopulateSeriesShape = true;
324
325        this.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap = new HashMap<>();
326        this.defaultItemLabelsVisible = false;
327
328        this.itemLabelFontMap = new HashMap<>();
329        this.defaultItemLabelFont = new Font("SansSerif", Font.PLAIN, 10);
330
331        this.itemLabelPaints = new HashMap<>();
332        this.defaultItemLabelPaint = Color.BLACK;
333
334        this.positiveItemLabelPositionMap = new HashMap<>();
335        this.defaultPositiveItemLabelPosition = new ItemLabelPosition(
336                ItemLabelAnchor.OUTSIDE12, TextAnchor.BOTTOM_CENTER);
337
338        abstractRendererProduct.setNegativeItemLabelPositionMap(new HashMap<>());
339        abstractRendererProduct.setDefaultNegativeItemLabelPosition2(
340                                new ItemLabelPosition(ItemLabelAnchor.OUTSIDE6, TextAnchor.TOP_CENTER));
341
342        this.seriesCreateEntitiesMap = new HashMap<>();
343        this.defaultCreateEntities = true;
344
345        this.defaultEntityRadius = 3;
346
347        this.seriesLegendShapes = new HashMap<>();
348        this.defaultLegendShape = null;
349
350        this.treatLegendShapeAsLine = false;
351
352        this.legendTextFontMap = new HashMap<>();
353        this.defaultLegendTextFont = null;
354
355        this.legendTextPaints = new HashMap<>();
356        this.defaultLegendTextPaint = null;
357
358        abstractRendererProduct4.setListenerList(new EventListenerList());
359    }
360
361    /**
362     * Receives a chart element visitor.
363     * 
364     * @param visitor  the visitor ({@code null} not permitted).
365     */
366    @Override
367    public void receive(ChartElementVisitor visitor) {
368        visitor.visit(this);
369    }
370    
371    /**
372     * Returns the drawing supplier from the plot.
373     *
374     * @return The drawing supplier.
375     */
376    public abstract DrawingSupplier getDrawingSupplier();
377
378    /**
379     * Adds a {@code KEY_BEGIN_ELEMENT} hint to the graphics target.  This
380     * hint is recognised by <b>JFreeSVG</b> (in theory it could be used by 
381     * other {@code Graphics2D} implementations also).
382     * 
383     * @param g2  the graphics target ({@code null} not permitted).
384     * @param key  the key ({@code null} not permitted).
385     * 
386     * @see #endElementGroup(java.awt.Graphics2D)
387     */
388    protected void beginElementGroup(Graphics2D g2, ItemKey key) {
389        Args.nullNotPermitted(key, "key");
390        Map<String, String> m = new HashMap<>(1);
391        m.put("ref", key.toJSONString());
392        g2.setRenderingHint(ChartHints.KEY_BEGIN_ELEMENT, m);        
393    }
394    
395    /**
396     * Adds a {@code KEY_END_ELEMENT} hint to the graphics target.
397     * 
398     * @param g2  the graphics target ({@code null} not permitted).
399     * 
400     * @see #beginElementGroup(java.awt.Graphics2D, org.jfree.data.ItemKey)
401     */
402    protected void endElementGroup(Graphics2D g2) {
403        g2.setRenderingHint(ChartHints.KEY_END_ELEMENT, Boolean.TRUE);
404    }
405
406    // SERIES VISIBLE (not yet respected by all renderers)
407
408    /**
409     * Returns a boolean that indicates whether or not the specified item
410     * should be drawn.
411     *
412     * @param series  the series index.
413     * @param item  the item index.
414     *
415     * @return A boolean.
416     */
417    public boolean getItemVisible(int series, int item) {
418        return abstractRendererProduct3.isSeriesVisible(series);
419    }
420
421    /**
422     * Returns a boolean that indicates whether or not the specified series
423     * should be drawn.  In fact this method should be named 
424     * lookupSeriesVisible() to be consistent with the other series
425     * attributes and avoid confusion with the getSeriesVisible() method.
426     *
427     * @param series  the series index.
428     *
429     * @return A boolean.
430     */
431    public boolean isSeriesVisible(int series) {
432        return abstractRendererProduct3.isSeriesVisible(series);
433    }
434
435    /**
436     * Returns the flag that controls whether a series is visible.
437     *
438     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
439     *
440     * @return The flag (possibly {@code null}).
441     *
442     * @see #setSeriesVisible(int, Boolean)
443     */
444    public Boolean getSeriesVisible(int series) {
445        return this.abstractRendererProduct3.getSeriesVisibleMap().get(series);
446    }
447
448    /**
449     * Sets the flag that controls whether a series is visible and sends a
450     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
451     *
452     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
453     * @param visible  the flag ({@code null} permitted).
454     *
455     * @see #getSeriesVisible(int)
456     */
457    public void setSeriesVisible(int series, Boolean visible) {
458        setSeriesVisible(series, visible, true);
459    }
460
461    /**
462     * Sets the flag that controls whether a series is visible and, if
463     * requested, sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered
464     * listeners.
465     *
466     * @param series  the series index.
467     * @param visible  the flag ({@code null} permitted).
468     * @param notify  notify listeners?
469     *
470     * @see #getSeriesVisible(int)
471     */
472    public void setSeriesVisible(int series, Boolean visible, boolean notify) {
473        this.abstractRendererProduct3.getSeriesVisibleMap().put(series, visible);
474        if (notify) {
475            // we create an event with a special flag set...the purpose of
476            // this is to communicate to the plot (the default receiver of
477            // the event) that series visibility has changed so the axis
478            // ranges might need updating...
479            RendererChangeEvent e = new RendererChangeEvent(this, true);
480            abstractRendererProduct4.notifyListeners(e);
481        }
482    }
483
484    /**
485     * Returns the default visibility for all series.
486     *
487     * @return The default visibility.
488     *
489     * @see #setDefaultSeriesVisible(boolean)
490     */
491    public boolean getDefaultSeriesVisible() {
492        return this.abstractRendererProduct3.getDefaultSeriesVisible();
493    }
494
495    /**
496     * Sets the default series visibility and sends a 
497     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
498     *
499     * @param visible  the flag.
500     *
501     * @see #getDefaultSeriesVisible()
502     */
503    public void setDefaultSeriesVisible(boolean visible) {
504        // defer argument checking...
505        abstractRendererProduct3.setDefaultSeriesVisible(visible, true, this);
506    }
507
508    /**
509     * Sets the default series visibility and, if requested, sends
510     * a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
511     *
512     * @param visible  the visibility.
513     * @param notify  notify listeners?
514     *
515     * @see #getDefaultSeriesVisible()
516     */
517    public void setDefaultSeriesVisible(boolean visible, boolean notify) {
518        abstractRendererProduct3.setDefaultSeriesVisible(visible, notify, this);
519    }
520
521    // SERIES VISIBLE IN LEGEND (not yet respected by all renderers)
522
523    /**
524     * Returns {@code true} if the series should be shown in the legend,
525     * and {@code false} otherwise.
526     *
527     * @param series  the series index.
528     *
529     * @return A boolean.
530     */
531    public boolean isSeriesVisibleInLegend(int series) {
532        return abstractRendererProduct2.isSeriesVisibleInLegend(series);
533    }
534
535    /**
536     * Returns the flag that controls whether a series is visible in the
537     * legend.  This method returns only the "per series" settings - to
538     * incorporate the default settings as well, you need to use the
539     * {@link #isSeriesVisibleInLegend(int)} method.
540     *
541     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
542     *
543     * @return The flag (possibly {@code null}).
544     *
545     * @see #setSeriesVisibleInLegend(int, Boolean)
546     */
547    public Boolean getSeriesVisibleInLegend(int series) {
548        return this.abstractRendererProduct2.getSeriesVisibleInLegendMap().get(series);
549    }
550
551    /**
552     * Sets the flag that controls whether a series is visible in the legend
553     * and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
554     *
555     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
556     * @param visible  the flag ({@code null} permitted).
557     *
558     * @see #getSeriesVisibleInLegend(int)
559     */
560    public void setSeriesVisibleInLegend(int series, Boolean visible) {
561        setSeriesVisibleInLegend(series, visible, true);
562    }
563
564    /**
565     * Sets the flag that controls whether a series is visible in the legend
566     * and, if requested, sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered
567     * listeners.
568     *
569     * @param series  the series index.
570     * @param visible  the flag ({@code null} permitted).
571     * @param notify  notify listeners?
572     *
573     * @see #getSeriesVisibleInLegend(int)
574     */
575    public void setSeriesVisibleInLegend(int series, Boolean visible, boolean notify) {
576        this.abstractRendererProduct2.getSeriesVisibleInLegendMap().put(series, visible);
577        if (notify) {
578            fireChangeEvent();
579        }
580    }
581
582    /**
583     * Returns the default visibility in the legend for all series.
584     *
585     * @return The default visibility.
586     *
587     * @see #setDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend(boolean)
588     */
589    public boolean getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend() {
590        return this.abstractRendererProduct2.getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend();
591    }
592
593    /**
594     * Sets the default visibility in the legend and sends a
595     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
596     *
597     * @param visible  the flag.
598     *
599     * @see #getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend()
600     */
601    public void setDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend(boolean visible) {
602        // defer argument checking...
603        abstractRendererProduct2.setDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend(visible, true, this);
604    }
605
606    /**
607     * Sets the default visibility in the legend and, if requested, sends
608     * a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
609     *
610     * @param visible  the visibility.
611     * @param notify  notify listeners?
612     *
613     * @see #getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend()
614     */
615    public void setDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend(boolean visible, 
616            boolean notify) {
617        abstractRendererProduct2.setDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend(visible, notify, this);
618    }
619
620    // PAINT
621
622    /**
623     * Returns the paint used to fill data items as they are drawn.
624     * (this is typically the same for an entire series).
625     * <p>
626     * The default implementation passes control to the
627     * {@code lookupSeriesPaint()} method. You can override this method
628     * if you require different behaviour.
629     *
630     * @param row  the row (or series) index (zero-based).
631     * @param column  the column (or category) index (zero-based).
632     *
633     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
634     */
635    public Paint getItemPaint(int row, int column) {
636        return lookupSeriesPaint(row);
637    }
638
639    /**
640     * Returns the paint used to fill an item drawn by the renderer.
641     *
642     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
643     *
644     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
645     */
646    public Paint lookupSeriesPaint(int series) {
647
648        Paint seriesPaint = getSeriesPaint(series);
649        if (seriesPaint == null && this.autoPopulateSeriesPaint) {
650            DrawingSupplier supplier = getDrawingSupplier();
651            if (supplier != null) {
652                seriesPaint = supplier.getNextPaint();
653                setSeriesPaint(series, seriesPaint, false);
654            }
655        }
656        if (seriesPaint == null) {
657            seriesPaint = this.defaultPaint;
658        }
659        return seriesPaint;
660
661    }
662
663    /**
664     * Returns the paint used to fill an item drawn by the renderer.
665     *
666     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
667     *
668     * @return The paint (possibly {@code null}).
669     *
670     * @see #setSeriesPaint(int, Paint)
671     */
672    public Paint getSeriesPaint(int series) {
673        return this.seriesPaintMap.get(series);
674    }
675
676    /**
677     * Sets the paint used for a series and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent}
678     * to all registered listeners.
679     *
680     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
681     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} permitted).
682     *
683     * @see #getSeriesPaint(int)
684     */
685    public void setSeriesPaint(int series, Paint paint) {
686        setSeriesPaint(series, paint, true);
687    }
688
689    /**
690     * Sets the paint used for a series and, if requested, sends a
691     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
692     *
693     * @param series  the series index.
694     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} permitted).
695     * @param notify  notify listeners?
696     *
697     * @see #getSeriesPaint(int)
698     */
699    public void setSeriesPaint(int series, Paint paint, boolean notify) {
700        this.seriesPaintMap.put(series, paint);
701        if (notify) {
702            fireChangeEvent();
703        }
704    }
705
706    /**
707     * Clears the series paint settings for this renderer and, if requested,
708     * sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
709     *
710     * @param notify  notify listeners?
711     */
712    public void clearSeriesPaints(boolean notify) {
713        this.seriesPaintMap.clear();
714        if (notify) {
715            fireChangeEvent();
716        }
717    }
718
719    /**
720     * Returns the default paint.
721     *
722     * @return The default paint (never {@code null}).
723     *
724     * @see #setDefaultPaint(Paint)
725     */
726    public Paint getDefaultPaint() {
727        return this.defaultPaint;
728    }
729
730    /**
731     * Sets the default paint and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all
732     * registered listeners.
733     *
734     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} not permitted).
735     *
736     * @see #getDefaultPaint()
737     */
738    public void setDefaultPaint(Paint paint) {
739        // defer argument checking...
740        setDefaultPaint(paint, true);
741    }
742
743    /**
744     * Sets the default series paint and, if requested, sends a
745     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
746     *
747     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} not permitted).
748     * @param notify  notify listeners?
749     *
750     * @see #getDefaultPaint()
751     */
752    public void setDefaultPaint(Paint paint, boolean notify) {
753        this.defaultPaint = paint;
754        if (notify) {
755            fireChangeEvent();
756        }
757    }
758
759    /**
760     * Returns the flag that controls whether or not the series paint list is
761     * automatically populated when {@link #lookupSeriesPaint(int)} is called.
762     *
763     * @return A boolean.
764     *
765     * @see #setAutoPopulateSeriesPaint(boolean)
766     */
767    public boolean getAutoPopulateSeriesPaint() {
768        return this.autoPopulateSeriesPaint;
769    }
770
771    /**
772     * Sets the flag that controls whether or not the series paint list is
773     * automatically populated when {@link #lookupSeriesPaint(int)} is called.
774     *

779    public void setAutoPopulateSeriesPaint(boolean auto) {
780        this.autoPopulateSeriesPaint = auto;

783    //// FILL PAINT //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
784
785    /**
786     * Returns the paint used to fill data items as they are drawn.  The
787     * default implementation passes control to the
788     * {@link #lookupSeriesFillPaint(int)} method - you can override this
789     * method if you require different behaviour.
790     *
791     * @param row  the row (or series) index (zero-based).
792     * @param column  the column (or category) index (zero-based).
793     *
794     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
795     */
796    public Paint getItemFillPaint(int row, int column) {
797        return lookupSeriesFillPaint(row);
798    }
799
800    /**
801     * Returns the paint used to fill an item drawn by the renderer.
802     *
803     * @param series  the series (zero-based index).
804     *
805     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
806     */
807    public Paint lookupSeriesFillPaint(int series) {
808
809        Paint seriesFillPaint = getSeriesFillPaint(series);
810        if (seriesFillPaint == null && this.autoPopulateSeriesFillPaint) {
811            DrawingSupplier supplier = getDrawingSupplier();
812            if (supplier != null) {
813                seriesFillPaint = supplier.getNextFillPaint();
814                setSeriesFillPaint(series, seriesFillPaint, false);
815            }
816        }
817        if (seriesFillPaint == null) {
818            seriesFillPaint = this.defaultFillPaint;
819        }
820        return seriesFillPaint;
821
822    }
823
824    /**
825     * Returns the paint used to fill an item drawn by the renderer.
826     *
827     * @param series  the series (zero-based index).
828     *
829     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
830     *
831     * @see #setSeriesFillPaint(int, Paint)
832     */
833    public Paint getSeriesFillPaint(int series) {
834        return this.seriesFillPaintMap.get(series);
835    }
836
837    /**
838     * Sets the paint used for a series fill and sends a
839     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
840     *
841     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
842     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} permitted).
843     *
844     * @see #getSeriesFillPaint(int)
845     */
846    public void setSeriesFillPaint(int series, Paint paint) {
847        setSeriesFillPaint(series, paint, true);
848    }
849
850    /**
851     * Sets the paint used to fill a series and, if requested,
852     * sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
853     *
854     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
855     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} permitted).
856     * @param notify  notify listeners?
857     *
858     * @see #getSeriesFillPaint(int)
859     */
860    public void setSeriesFillPaint(int series, Paint paint, boolean notify) {
861        this.seriesFillPaintMap.put(series, paint);
862        if (notify) {
863            fireChangeEvent();
864        }
865    }
866
867    /**
868     * Returns the default fill paint.
869     *
870     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
871     *
872     * @see #setDefaultFillPaint(Paint)
873     */
874    public Paint getDefaultFillPaint() {
875        return this.defaultFillPaint;
876    }
877
878    /**
879     * Sets the default fill paint and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to
880     * all registered listeners.
881     *
882     * @param paint  the paint ({@code null} not permitted).
883     *
884     * @see #getDefaultFillPaint()
885     */
886    public void setDefaultFillPaint(Paint paint) {
887        // defer argument checking...
888        setDefaultFillPaint(paint, true);
889    }
890
891    /**
892     * Sets the default fill paint and, if requested, sends a
893     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
894     *

896     * @param notify  notify listeners?
897     *

901        Args.nullNotPermitted(paint, "paint");
902        this.defaultFillPaint = paint;
903        if (notify) {
904            fireChangeEvent();
905        }

934    // OUTLINE PAINT //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
935
936    /**
937     * Returns the paint used to outline data items as they are drawn.
938     * (this is typically the same for an entire series).
939     * <p>
940     * The default implementation passes control to the
941     * {@link #lookupSeriesOutlinePaint} method.  You can override this method
942     * if you require different behaviour.
943     *
944     * @param row  the row (or series) index (zero-based).
945     * @param column  the column (or category) index (zero-based).
946     *
947     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
948     */
949    public Paint getItemOutlinePaint(int row, int column) {
950        return lookupSeriesOutlinePaint(row);
951    }
952
953    /**
954     * Returns the paint used to outline an item drawn by the renderer.
955     *
956     * @param series  the series (zero-based index).
957     *
958     * @return The paint (never {@code null}).
959     */
960    public Paint lookupSeriesOutlinePaint(int series) {
961
962        Paint seriesOutlinePaint = getSeriesOutlinePaint(series);
963        if (seriesOutlinePaint == null && this.autoPopulateSeriesOutlinePaint) {
964            DrawingSupplier supplier = getDrawingSupplier();
965            if (supplier != null) {
966                seriesOutlinePaint = supplier.getNextOutlinePaint();
967                setSeriesOutlinePaint(series, seriesOutlinePaint, false);
968            }
969        }
970        if (seriesOutlinePaint == null) {
971            seriesOutlinePaint = this.defaultOutlinePaint;
972        }
973        return seriesOutlinePaint;
974
975    }
976
977    /**
978     * Returns the paint used to outline an item drawn by the renderer.
979     *
980     * @param series  the series (zero-based index).
981     *
982     * @return The paint (possibly {@code null}).
983     *
984     * @see #setSeriesOutlinePaint(int, Paint)
985     */
986    public Paint getSeriesOutlinePaint(int series) {
987        return this.seriesOutlinePaintMap.get(series);
988    }

1016            fireChangeEvent();

1089    /**
1090     * Returns the stroke used to draw data items.
1091     * <p>
1092     * The default implementation passes control to the getSeriesStroke method.
1093     * You can override this method if you require different behaviour.
1094     *
1095     * @param row  the row (or series) index (zero-based).
1096     * @param column  the column (or category) index (zero-based).
1097     *
1098     * @return The stroke (never {@code null}).
1099     */
1100    public Stroke getItemStroke(int row, int column) {
1101        return lookupSeriesStroke(row);
1102    }
1103
1104    /**
1105     * Returns the stroke used to draw the items in a series.
1106     *
1107     * @param series  the series (zero-based index).
1108     *
1109     * @return The stroke (never {@code null}).
1110     */
1111    public Stroke lookupSeriesStroke(int series) {
1112
1113        Stroke result = getSeriesStroke(series);
1114        if (result == null && this.autoPopulateSeriesStroke) {
1115            DrawingSupplier supplier = getDrawingSupplier();
1116            if (supplier != null) {
1117                result = supplier.getNextStroke();
1118                setSeriesStroke(series, result, false);
1119            }
1120        }
1121        if (result == null) {
1122            result = this.defaultStroke;
1123        }
1124        return result;
1125
1126    }
1127

1129     * Returns the stroke used to draw the items in a series.
1130     *
1131     * @param series  the series (zero-based index).

1134     *
1135     * @see #setSeriesStroke(int, Stroke)

1177    public void clearSeriesStrokes(boolean notify) {

1179        if (notify) {

1181        }

1402    /**
1403     * Returns a shape used to represent a data item.
1404     * <p>
1405     * The default implementation passes control to the 
1406     * {@link #lookupSeriesShape(int)} method. You can override this method if 
1407     * you require different behaviour.
1408     *
1409     * @param row  the row (or series) index (zero-based).
1410     * @param column  the column (or category) index (zero-based).
1411     *
1412     * @return The shape (never {@code null}).
1413     */

1415        return lookupSeriesShape(row);
1416    }

1418    /**
1419     * Returns a shape used to represent the items in a series.
1420     *
1421     * @param series  the series (zero-based index).
1422     *
1423     * @return The shape (never {@code null}).
1424     */
1425    public Shape lookupSeriesShape(int series) {
1426
1427        Shape result = getSeriesShape(series);
1428        if (result == null && this.autoPopulateSeriesShape) {
1429            DrawingSupplier supplier = getDrawingSupplier();
1430            if (supplier != null) {
1431                result = supplier.getNextShape();
1432                setSeriesShape(series, result, false);
1433            }
1434        }
1435        if (result == null) {
1436            result = this.defaultShape;
1437        }
1438        return result;
1439
1440    }

1443     * Returns a shape used to represent the items in a series.
1444     *
1445     * @param series  the series (zero-based index).

1448     *
1449     * @see #setSeriesShape(int, Shape)

1468    /**

1472     * @param series  the series index (zero based).
1473     * @param shape  the shape ({@code null} permitted).
1474     * @param notify  notify listeners?
1475     *
1476     * @see #getSeriesShape(int)
1477     */
1478    public void setSeriesShape(int series, Shape shape, boolean notify) {
1479        this.seriesShapeMap.put(series, shape);
1480        if (notify) {
1481            fireChangeEvent();
1482        }
1483    }
1484
1485    /**
1486     * Returns the default shape.
1487     *
1488     * @return The shape (never {@code null}).
1489     *
1490     * @see #setDefaultShape(Shape)
1491     */
1492    public Shape getDefaultShape() {
1493        return this.defaultShape;
1494    }

1501     *
1502     * @see #getDefaultShape()
1503     */
1504    public void setDefaultShape(Shape shape) {
1505        // defer argument checking...
1506        setDefaultShape(shape, true);
1507    }

1510     * Sets the default shape and, if requested, sends a
1511     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.

1515     *

1523        }

1550    // ITEM LABEL VISIBILITY...
1551
1552    /**
1553     * Returns {@code true} if an item label is visible, and
1554     * {@code false} otherwise.
1555     *
1556     * @param row  the row (or series) index (zero-based).
1557     * @param column  the column (or category) index (zero-based).
1558     *
1559     * @return A boolean.
1560     */
1561    public boolean isItemLabelVisible(int row, int column) {
1562        return isSeriesItemLabelsVisible(row);
1563    }
1564
1565    /**
1566     * Returns {@code true} if the item labels for a series are visible,
1567     * and {@code false} otherwise.
1568     *
1569     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
1570     *
1571     * @return A boolean.
1572     */
1573    public boolean isSeriesItemLabelsVisible(int series) {
1574        Boolean b = this.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap.get(series);
1575        if (b == null) {
1576            return this.defaultItemLabelsVisible;
1577        }
1578        return b;
1579    }
1580
1581    /**
1582     * Sets a flag that controls the visibility of the item labels for a series,
1583     * and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
1584     *
1585     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
1586     * @param visible  the flag.
1587     */
1588    public void setSeriesItemLabelsVisible(int series, boolean visible) {
1589        setSeriesItemLabelsVisible(series, Boolean.valueOf(visible));
1590    }
1591
1592    /**
1593     * Sets the visibility of the item labels for a series and sends a
1594     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
1595     *
1596     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
1597     * @param visible  the flag ({@code null} permitted).
1598     */
1599    public void setSeriesItemLabelsVisible(int series, Boolean visible) {
1600        setSeriesItemLabelsVisible(series, visible, true);
1601    }
1602
1603    /**
1604     * Sets the visibility of item labels for a series and, if requested, sends
1605     * a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
1606     *
1607     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).
1608     * @param visible  the visible flag.
1609     * @param notify  a flag that controls whether or not listeners are
1610     *                notified.
1611     */
1612    public void setSeriesItemLabelsVisible(int series, Boolean visible, boolean notify) {
1613        this.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap.put(series, visible);
1614        if (notify) {
1615            fireChangeEvent();
1616        }
1617    }
1618
1619    /**
1620     * Returns the base setting for item label visibility.  A {@code null}
1621     * result should be interpreted as equivalent to {@code Boolean.FALSE}.
1622     *
1623     * @return A flag (possibly {@code null}).
1624     *
1625     * @see #setDefaultItemLabelsVisible(boolean)
1626     */
1627    public boolean getDefaultItemLabelsVisible() {
1628        return this.defaultItemLabelsVisible;
1629    }
1630
1631    /**
1632     * Sets the base flag that controls whether or not item labels are visible,
1633     * and sends a {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
1634     *
1635     * @param visible  the flag.
1636     *
1637     * @see #getDefaultItemLabelsVisible()
1638     */
1639    public void setDefaultItemLabelsVisible(boolean visible) {
1640        setDefaultItemLabelsVisible(visible, true);
1641    }
1642
1643    /**
1644     * Sets the base visibility for item labels and, if requested, sends a
1645     * {@link RendererChangeEvent} to all registered listeners.
1646     *
1647     * @param visible  the flag ({@code null} is permitted, and viewed
1648     *     as equivalent to {@code Boolean.FALSE}).
1649     * @param notify  a flag that controls whether or not listeners are
1650     *                notified.
1651     *
1652     * @see #getDefaultItemLabelsVisible() 
1653     */
1654    public void setDefaultItemLabelsVisible(boolean visible, boolean notify) {
1655        this.defaultItemLabelsVisible = visible;
1656        if (notify) {
1657            fireChangeEvent();
1658        }
1659    }

1663    /**
1664     * Returns the font for an item label.

1667     * @param column  the column (or category) index (zero-based).
1668     *
1669     * @return The font (never {@code null}).
1670     */
1671    public Font getItemLabelFont(int row, int column) {
1672        Font result = getSeriesItemLabelFont(row);
1673        if (result == null) {
1674            result = this.defaultItemLabelFont;
1675        }
1676        return result;
1677    }

1891     *
1892     * @see #setSeriesPositiveItemLabelPosition(int, ItemLabelPosition)
1893     */
1894    public ItemLabelPosition getSeriesPositiveItemLabelPosition(int series) {
1895        // otherwise look up the position table
1896        ItemLabelPosition position = this.positiveItemLabelPositionMap.get(series);
1897        if (position == null) {
1898            position = this.defaultPositiveItemLabelPosition;
1899        }
1900        return position;

2100    /**
2101     * Returns a boolean that indicates whether or not the specified item
2102     * should have a chart entity created for it.
2103     *
2104     * @param series  the series index.
2105     * @param item  the item index.
2106     *
2107     * @return A boolean.
2108     */
2109    public boolean getItemCreateEntity(int series, int item) {
2110        Boolean b = getSeriesCreateEntities(series);
2111        if (b != null) {
2112            return b;
2113        }
2114        // otherwise...
2115        return this.defaultCreateEntities;
2116    }
2117
2118    /**
2119     * Returns the flag that controls whether entities are created for a
2120     * series.
2121     *
2122     * @param series  the series index (zero-based).

2125     *
2126     * @see #setSeriesCreateEntities(int, Boolean)

2128    public Boolean getSeriesCreateEntities(int series) {
2129        return this.seriesCreateEntitiesMap.get(series);

2232     *

2234     *
2235     * @return The shape (possibly {@code null}).
2236     */
2237    public Shape lookupLegendShape(int series) {
2238        Shape result = getLegendShape(series);
2239        if (result == null) {
2240            result = this.defaultLegendShape;
2241        }

2243            result = lookupSeriesShape(series);
2244        }
2245        return result;
2246    }

2461
2462    /** The adjacent offset. */
2463    private static final double ADJ = Math.cos(Math.PI / 6.0);
2464
2465    /** The opposite offset. */
2466    private static final double OPP = Math.sin(Math.PI / 6.0);
2467
2468    /**
2469     * Calculates the item label anchor point.
2470     *
2471     * @param anchor  the anchor.
2472     * @param x  the x coordinate.
2473     * @param y  the y coordinate.
2474     * @param orientation  the plot orientation.
2475     *
2476     * @return The anchor point (never {@code null}).
2477     */
2478    protected Point2D calculateLabelAnchorPoint(ItemLabelAnchor anchor,
2479            double x, double y, PlotOrientation orientation) {
2480        Args.nullNotPermitted(anchor, "anchor");
2481        Point2D result = null;
2482        switch (anchor) {
2483            case CENTER:
2484                result = new Point2D.Double(x, y);
2485                break;
2486            case INSIDE1:
2487                result = new Point2D.Double(x + OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2488                        y - ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2489                break;
2490            case INSIDE2:
2491                result = new Point2D.Double(x + ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2492                        y - OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2493                break;
2494            case INSIDE3:
2495                result = new Point2D.Double(x + this.itemLabelAnchorOffset, y);
2496                break;
2497            case INSIDE4:
2498                result = new Point2D.Double(x + ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2499                        y + OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2500                break;
2501            case INSIDE5:
2502                result = new Point2D.Double(x + OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2503                        y + ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2504                break;
2505            case INSIDE6:
2506                result = new Point2D.Double(x, y + this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2507                break;
2508            case INSIDE7:
2509                result = new Point2D.Double(x - OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2510                        y + ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2511                break;
2512            case INSIDE8:
2513                result = new Point2D.Double(x - ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2514                        y + OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2515                break;
2516            case INSIDE9:
2517                result = new Point2D.Double(x - this.itemLabelAnchorOffset, y);
2518                break;
2519            case INSIDE10:
2520                result = new Point2D.Double(x - ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2521                        y - OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2522                break;
2523            case INSIDE11:
2524                result = new Point2D.Double(x - OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2525                        y - ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2526                break;
2527            case INSIDE12:
2528                result = new Point2D.Double(x, y - this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2529                break;
2530            case OUTSIDE1:
2531                result = new Point2D.Double(
2532                        x + 2.0 * OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2533                        y - 2.0 * ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2534                break;
2535            case OUTSIDE2:
2536                result = new Point2D.Double(
2537                        x + 2.0 * ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2538                        y - 2.0 * OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2539                break;
2540            case OUTSIDE3:
2541                result = new Point2D.Double(x + 2.0 * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2542                        y);
2543                break;
2544            case OUTSIDE4:
2545                result = new Point2D.Double(
2546                        x + 2.0 * ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2547                        y + 2.0 * OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2548                break;
2549            case OUTSIDE5:
2550                result = new Point2D.Double(
2551                        x + 2.0 * OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2552                        y + 2.0 * ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2553                break;
2554            case OUTSIDE6:
2555                result = new Point2D.Double(x,
2556                        y + 2.0 * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2557                break;
2558            case OUTSIDE7:
2559                result = new Point2D.Double(
2560                        x - 2.0 * OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2561                        y + 2.0 * ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2562                break;
2563            case OUTSIDE8:
2564                result = new Point2D.Double(
2565                        x - 2.0 * ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2566                        y + 2.0 * OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2567                break;
2568            case OUTSIDE9:
2569                result = new Point2D.Double(x - 2.0 * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2570                        y);
2571                break;
2572            case OUTSIDE10:
2573                result = new Point2D.Double(
2574                        x - 2.0 * ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2575                        y - 2.0 * OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2576                break;
2577            case OUTSIDE11:
2578                result = new Point2D.Double(
2579                        x - 2.0 * OPP * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset,
2580                        y - 2.0 * ADJ * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2581                break;
2582            case OUTSIDE12:
2583                result = new Point2D.Double(x,
2584                        y - 2.0 * this.itemLabelAnchorOffset);
2585                break;
2586            default:
2587                throw new IllegalStateException("Unexpected anchor value.");
2588        }
2589        return result;
2590    }

2645    /**
2646     * Tests this renderer for equality with another object.
2647     *
2648     * @param obj  the object ({@code null} permitted).
2649     *
2650     * @return {@code true} or {@code false}.
2651     */
2652    @Override
2653    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
2654        if (obj == this) {
2655            return true;
2656        }
2657        if (!(obj instanceof AbstractRenderer)) {
2658            return false;
2659        }
2660        AbstractRenderer that = (AbstractRenderer) obj;
2661        if (this.dataBoundsIncludesVisibleSeriesOnly
2662                != that.dataBoundsIncludesVisibleSeriesOnly) {
2663            return false;
2664        }
2665        if (this.treatLegendShapeAsLine != that.treatLegendShapeAsLine) {
2666            return false;
2667        }
2668        if (this.defaultEntityRadius != that.defaultEntityRadius) {
2669            return false;
2670        }
2671        if (!this.abstractRendererProduct3.getSeriesVisibleMap().equals(that.abstractRendererProduct3.getSeriesVisibleMap())) {
2672            return false;
2673        }
2674        if (this.abstractRendererProduct3.getDefaultSeriesVisible() != that.abstractRendererProduct3.getDefaultSeriesVisible()) {
2675            return false;
2676        }
2677        if (!this.abstractRendererProduct2.getSeriesVisibleInLegendMap().equals(that.abstractRendererProduct2.getSeriesVisibleInLegendMap())) {
2678            return false;
2679        }
2680        if (this.abstractRendererProduct2.getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend()
2681                != that.abstractRendererProduct2.getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend()) {
2682            return false;
2683        }
2684        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.seriesPaintMap, that.seriesPaintMap)) {
2685            return false;
2686        }
2687        if (this.autoPopulateSeriesPaint != that.autoPopulateSeriesPaint) {
2688            return false;
2689        }
2690        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.defaultPaint, that.defaultPaint)) {
2691            return false;
2692        }
2693        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.seriesFillPaintMap, that.seriesFillPaintMap)) {
2694            return false;
2695        }
2696        if (this.autoPopulateSeriesFillPaint != that.autoPopulateSeriesFillPaint) {
2697            return false;
2698        }
2699        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.defaultFillPaint, that.defaultFillPaint)) {
2700            return false;
2701        }
2702        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.seriesOutlinePaintMap, that.seriesOutlinePaintMap)) {
2703            return false;
2704        }
2705        if (this.autoPopulateSeriesOutlinePaint != that.autoPopulateSeriesOutlinePaint) {
2706            return false;
2707        }
2708        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.defaultOutlinePaint, that.defaultOutlinePaint)) {
2709            return false;
2710        }
2711        if (!Objects.equals(this.seriesStrokeMap, that.seriesStrokeMap)) {
2712            return false;
2713        }
2714        if (this.autoPopulateSeriesStroke != that.autoPopulateSeriesStroke) {
2715            return false;
2716        }
2717        if (!Objects.equals(this.defaultStroke, that.defaultStroke)) {
2718            return false;
2719        }
2720        if (!Objects.equals(this.seriesOutlineStrokeMap, that.seriesOutlineStrokeMap)) {
2721            return false;
2722        }
2723        if (this.autoPopulateSeriesOutlineStroke != that.autoPopulateSeriesOutlineStroke) {
2724            return false;
2725        }
2726        if (!Objects.equals(this.defaultOutlineStroke, that.defaultOutlineStroke)) {
2727            return false;
2728        }
2729        if (!ShapeUtils.equal(this.seriesShapeMap, that.seriesShapeMap)) {
2730            return false;
2731        }
2732        if (this.autoPopulateSeriesShape != that.autoPopulateSeriesShape) {
2733            return false;
2734        }
2735        if (!ShapeUtils.equal(this.defaultShape, that.defaultShape)) {
2736            return false;
2737        }
2738        if (!Objects.equals(this.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap, that.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap)) {
2739            return false;
2740        }
2741        if (!Objects.equals(this.defaultItemLabelsVisible, that.defaultItemLabelsVisible)) {
2742            return false;
2743        }
2744        if (!Objects.equals(this.itemLabelFontMap, that.itemLabelFontMap)) {
2745            return false;
2746        }
2747        if (!Objects.equals(this.defaultItemLabelFont, that.defaultItemLabelFont)) {
2748            return false;
2749        }
2750
2751        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.itemLabelPaints, that.itemLabelPaints)) {
2752            return false;
2753        }
2754        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.defaultItemLabelPaint,
2755                that.defaultItemLabelPaint)) {
2756            return false;
2757        }
2758
2759        if (!Objects.equals(this.positiveItemLabelPositionMap, that.positiveItemLabelPositionMap)) {
2760            return false;
2761        }
2762        if (!Objects.equals(this.defaultPositiveItemLabelPosition, that.defaultPositiveItemLabelPosition)) {
2763            return false;
2764        }
2765
2766        if (!Objects.equals(this.abstractRendererProduct.getNegativeItemLabelPositionMap(), that.abstractRendererProduct.getNegativeItemLabelPositionMap())) {
2767            return false;
2768        }
2769        if (!Objects.equals(this.abstractRendererProduct.getDefaultNegativeItemLabelPosition(), that.abstractRendererProduct.getDefaultNegativeItemLabelPosition())) {
2770            return false;
2771        }
2772        if (this.itemLabelAnchorOffset != that.itemLabelAnchorOffset) {
2773            return false;
2774        }
2775        if (!Objects.equals(this.seriesCreateEntitiesMap, that.seriesCreateEntitiesMap)) {
2776            return false;
2777        }
2778        if (this.defaultCreateEntities != that.defaultCreateEntities) {
2779            return false;
2780        }
2781        if (!ShapeUtils.equal(this.seriesLegendShapes, that.seriesLegendShapes)) {
2782            return false;
2783        }
2784        if (!ShapeUtils.equal(this.defaultLegendShape, that.defaultLegendShape)) {
2785            return false;
2786        }
2787        if (!Objects.equals(this.legendTextFontMap, that.legendTextFontMap)) {
2788            return false;
2789        }
2790        if (!Objects.equals(this.defaultLegendTextFont, that.defaultLegendTextFont)) {
2791            return false;
2792        }
2793        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.legendTextPaints, that.legendTextPaints)) {
2794            return false;
2795        }
2796        if (!PaintUtils.equal(this.defaultLegendTextPaint,
2797                that.defaultLegendTextPaint)) {
2798            return false;
2799        }
2800        return true;
2801    }

2803    /**
2804     * Returns a hashcode for the renderer.
2805     *
2806     * @return The hashcode.
2807     */
2808    @Override
2809    public int hashCode() {
2810        int result = 193;
2811        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.abstractRendererProduct3.getSeriesVisibleMap());
2812        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.abstractRendererProduct3.getDefaultSeriesVisible());
2813        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.abstractRendererProduct2.getSeriesVisibleInLegendMap());
2814        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.abstractRendererProduct2.getDefaultSeriesVisibleInLegend());
2815        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.seriesPaintMap);
2816        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.defaultPaint);
2817        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.seriesFillPaintMap);
2818        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.defaultFillPaint);
2819        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.seriesOutlinePaintMap);
2820        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.defaultOutlinePaint);
2821        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.seriesStrokeMap);
2822        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.defaultStroke);
2823        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.seriesOutlineStrokeMap);
2824        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.defaultOutlineStroke);
2825        // shapeList
2826        // baseShape
2827        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap);
2828        result = HashUtils.hashCode(result, this.defaultItemLabelsVisible);
2829        // itemLabelFontList
2830        // baseItemLabelFont
2831        // itemLabelPaintList
2832        // baseItemLabelPaint
2833        // positiveItemLabelPositionList
2834        // basePositiveItemLabelPosition
2835        // negativeItemLabelPositionList
2836        // baseNegativeItemLabelPosition
2837        // itemLabelAnchorOffset
2838        // createEntityList
2839        // baseCreateEntities
2840        return result;
2841    }

2843    /**
2844     * Returns an independent copy of the renderer.
2845     *
2846     * @return A clone.
2847     *
2848     * @throws CloneNotSupportedException if some component of the renderer
2849     *         does not support cloning.
2850     */
2851    @Override
2852    protected Object clone() throws CloneNotSupportedException {
2853        AbstractRenderer clone = (AbstractRenderer) super.clone();
2854                clone.abstractRendererProduct4 = (AbstractRendererProduct4) this.abstractRendererProduct4.clone();
2855                clone.abstractRendererProduct3 = (AbstractRendererProduct3) this.abstractRendererProduct3.clone();
2856                clone.abstractRendererProduct2 = (AbstractRendererProduct2) this.abstractRendererProduct2.clone();
2857                clone.abstractRendererProduct = (AbstractRendererProduct) this.abstractRendererProduct.clone();
2858
2859        if (this.abstractRendererProduct3.getSeriesVisibleMap() != null) {
2860            clone.abstractRendererProduct3
2861                                        .setSeriesVisibleMap(new HashMap<>(this.abstractRendererProduct3.getSeriesVisibleMap()));
2862        }
2863
2864        if (this.abstractRendererProduct2.getSeriesVisibleInLegendMap() != null) {
2865            clone.abstractRendererProduct2.setSeriesVisibleInLegendMap(
2866                                        new HashMap<>(this.abstractRendererProduct2.getSeriesVisibleInLegendMap()));
2867        }
2868
2869        // 'paint' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2870        if (this.seriesPaintMap != null) {
2871            clone.seriesPaintMap = new HashMap<>(this.seriesPaintMap);
2872        }
2873        // 'basePaint' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2874
2875        if (this.seriesFillPaintMap != null) {
2876            clone.seriesFillPaintMap = new HashMap<>(this.seriesFillPaintMap);
2877        }
2878        // 'outlinePaint' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2879        if (this.seriesOutlinePaintMap != null) {
2880            clone.seriesOutlinePaintMap = new HashMap<>(this.seriesOutlinePaintMap);
2881        }
2882        // 'baseOutlinePaint' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2883
2884        // 'stroke' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2885        if (this.seriesStrokeMap != null) {
2886            clone.seriesStrokeMap = CloneUtils.cloneMapValues(this.seriesStrokeMap);
2887        }
2888        // 'baseStroke' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2889
2890        // 'outlineStroke' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2891        if (this.seriesOutlineStrokeMap != null) {
2892            clone.seriesOutlineStrokeMap = CloneUtils.cloneMapValues(this.seriesOutlineStrokeMap);
2893        }
2894        // 'baseOutlineStroke' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2895
2896        if (this.seriesShapeMap != null) {
2897            clone.seriesShapeMap = ShapeUtils.cloneMap(this.seriesShapeMap);
2898        }
2899        clone.defaultShape = CloneUtils.clone(this.defaultShape);
2900
2901
2902        // 'seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2903        if (this.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap != null) {
2904            clone.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap = new HashMap<>(this.seriesItemLabelsVisibleMap);
2905        }
2906        // 'basePaint' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2907
2908        // 'itemLabelFont' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2909        if (this.itemLabelFontMap != null) {
2910            clone.itemLabelFontMap = new HashMap<>(this.itemLabelFontMap);
2911        }
2912        // 'baseItemLabelFont' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2913
2914        // 'itemLabelPaint' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2915        if (this.itemLabelPaints != null) {
2916            clone.itemLabelPaints  = new HashMap<>(this.itemLabelPaints);
2917        }
2918        // 'baseItemLabelPaint' : immutable, no need to clone reference
2919
2920        if (this.positiveItemLabelPositionMap != null) {
2921            clone.positiveItemLabelPositionMap 
2922                    = new HashMap<>(this.positiveItemLabelPositionMap);
2923        }
2924
2925        if (this.abstractRendererProduct.getNegativeItemLabelPositionMap() != null) {
2926            clone.abstractRendererProduct.setNegativeItemLabelPositionMap(
2927                                        new HashMap<>(this.abstractRendererProduct.getNegativeItemLabelPositionMap()));
2928        }
2929
2930        if (this.seriesCreateEntitiesMap != null) {
2931            clone.seriesCreateEntitiesMap = new HashMap<>(this.seriesCreateEntitiesMap);
2932        }
2933
2934        if (this.seriesLegendShapes != null) {
2935            clone.seriesLegendShapes = ShapeUtils.cloneMap(this.seriesLegendShapes);
2936        }
2937        if (this.legendTextFontMap != null) {
2938            // Font objects are immutable so just shallow copy the map
2939            clone.legendTextFontMap = new HashMap<>(this.legendTextFontMap);
2940        }
2941        if (this.legendTextPaints != null) {
2942            clone.legendTextPaints = new HashMap<>(this.legendTextPaints);
2943        }
2944        clone.abstractRendererProduct4.setListenerList(new EventListenerList());
2945        clone.event = null;
2946        return clone;
2947    }

2949    /**
2950     * Provides serialization support.
2951     *
2952     * @param stream  the output stream.
2953     *
2954     * @throws IOException  if there is an I/O error.
2955     */
2956    private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream stream) throws IOException {
2957        stream.defaultWriteObject();
2958                stream.writeObject(this.abstractRendererProduct4);
2959        SerialUtils.writeMapOfPaint(this.seriesPaintMap, stream);
2960        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.defaultPaint, stream);
2961        SerialUtils.writeMapOfPaint(this.seriesFillPaintMap, stream);
2962        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.defaultFillPaint, stream);
2963        SerialUtils.writeMapOfPaint(this.seriesOutlinePaintMap, stream);
2964        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.defaultOutlinePaint, stream);
2965        SerialUtils.writeMapOfStroke(this.seriesStrokeMap, stream);
2966        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.defaultStroke, stream);
2967        SerialUtils.writeMapOfStroke(this.seriesOutlineStrokeMap, stream);
2968        SerialUtils.writeStroke(this.defaultOutlineStroke, stream);
2969        SerialUtils.writeShape(this.defaultShape, stream);
2970        SerialUtils.writeMapOfPaint(this.itemLabelPaints, stream);        
2971        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.defaultItemLabelPaint, stream);
2972        SerialUtils.writeShape(this.defaultLegendShape, stream);
2973        SerialUtils.writeMapOfPaint(this.legendTextPaints, stream);        
2974        SerialUtils.writePaint(this.defaultLegendTextPaint, stream);
2975    }

2979     *
2980     * @param stream  the input stream.
2981     *

2983     * @throws ClassNotFoundException  if there is a classpath problem.

2986        stream.defaultReadObject();
2987                this.abstractRendererProduct4 = (AbstractRendererProduct4) stream.readObject();
2988        this.seriesPaintMap = SerialUtils.readMapOfPaint(stream);
2989        this.defaultPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
2990        this.seriesFillPaintMap = SerialUtils.readMapOfPaint(stream);
2991        this.defaultFillPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
2992        this.seriesOutlinePaintMap = SerialUtils.readMapOfPaint(stream);
2993        this.defaultOutlinePaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
2994        this.seriesStrokeMap = SerialUtils.readMapOfStroke(stream);
2995        this.defaultStroke = SerialUtils.readStroke(stream);
2996        this.seriesOutlineStrokeMap = SerialUtils.readMapOfStroke(stream);

2998        this.defaultShape = SerialUtils.readShape(stream);
2999        this.itemLabelPaints = SerialUtils.readMapOfPaint(stream);
3000        this.defaultItemLabelPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);
3001        this.defaultLegendShape = SerialUtils.readShape(stream);

3003        this.defaultLegendTextPaint = SerialUtils.readPaint(stream);

3006        // provided...
3007        abstractRendererProduct4.setListenerList(new EventListenerList());

3010        /**
3011         * Applies the attributes for this theme to an  {@link AbstractRenderer} .
3012         */
3013        public void applyToAbstractRenderer() {
3014                if (getAutoPopulateSeriesPaint()) {
3015                        clearSeriesPaints(false);
3016                }
3017                if (getAutoPopulateSeriesStroke()) {
3018                        clearSeriesStrokes(false);
3019                }
3020        }
